charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(B) POSSESSED WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE HYDROCHLORIDE (1)
18:924(c)(1)(B)(i) POSSESSED FIREARM DURING DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME (2)
18:922(g)(5) &; 924(a)(2) POSSESSION OF FIREARM IN COMMERCE BY ILLEGAL ALIEN (3)
18:922(g)(5) &; 924(a)(2) POSSESSION OF AMMUNITION IN COMMERCE BY ILLEGAL ALIEN (4)
26:5861(d) &; 5871 POSSESSED FIREARM WHICH HAD NOT BEEN REGISTERED TO HIM IN THE NATIONAL FIREARMS REGISTRATION &; TRANSFER RECORD (5)
18:1546(a) POSSESSION OF FORGED ALIEN REGISTRATION CARD (6)

21:841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(C); 18:922(g)(5), 924(a)(2), 924(c)(1)(A)(i) &; 1546(a); 42:408(a)(7)(B); 26:5861(d) &; 5871 Possess with intent to distribute cocaine; transport in interstate or foreign commerce ammunition by an alien; knowingly possess a firearm which had not been registered in the National Firearms Registration and Transfer Record; possession with intent to distribute cocaine; knowingly possess a fraudulent alien registration receipt card; knowingly possess a fraudulent social security number. [1:04-m-165]
